title: Arcade Portfolio
description: A retro arcade-themed portfolio website built with SvelteKit, featuring interactive CRT effects and GSAP animations.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Modern e-commerce platform with cart functionality, Stripe payments, and optimized product search for mobile and desktop.

title: Game Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for tracking player stats, achievements, and live game performance using WebSockets.

title: Indie Game Studio Branding
description: Comprehensive brand identity system including logo design, color palettes, and game-inspired marketing materials.

title: Startup Rebrand Campaign
description: A full rebrand for a growing startup, complete with new visual identity, website refresh, and pitch deck design.

title: UX Flow Optimization
description: Researched and redesigned user flows for a SaaS product, reducing friction and improving onboarding success rates.

title: Mobile App Wireframes
description: Interactive wireframes for a mobile productivity app, optimized for rapid iteration and stakeholder feedback.
